title: x/crypto/ssh/terminal: create stubs for plan9 methods
body:
Terminal methods defined for other GOOSs should be stubbed for plan9 so that tests can be run for all GOOS without failure.

Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
It was Gobot Gobot that failed; assume it is go1.6

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
Gobot Gobot failed a test for "plan9-386"

3. What did you do?
If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error.
A complete runnable program is good.
A link on play.golang.org is best.

While developing a test for terminal behavior, Gobot Gobot failed due to methods being undefined in plan9.

4. What did you expect to see?
Test skipped, either explicitly for plan9 or due to assumption of "not a terminal".

5. What did you see instead?
Test fails due to:
```
undefined: IsTerminal...
undefined: GetState...
undefined: Restore...
undefined: MakeRaw....
```
